entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0.100-rc.2.22452.3] Blazor server apps, pass dynamic variable to a component doesn't build on .net7 #27678
  • hotReload fails with exception "Could not load type 'AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument" #27676
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.2.22452.3] Microsoft.NETCore.App runtime package has mismatched version #27675

PullRequests

Created

  • Bugfix: Report error on conditional params authoring errors #27684
  • [main] Disable publishing artifacts at build task of template engine job to fix the failure of uploading artifacts in CI #27679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx]Disable publishing artifacts at build task of template engine job to fix the failure of uploading artifacts in CI #27674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27671

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1983954 #27672

Updated

  • Fix br compression size regression in Blazor WASM #27659
    arch-wasm, Area-AspNetCore
  • do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type #27648
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1984097 #27667
  • Implements standard dotnet options for controlling output in dotnet new #27628
    area: dotnet new
  • Apply the same editorconfig rules to TemplateEngine parts as dotnet/templating repo #27611
    Area-Compatibility
  • Lead to `dotnet new create <template name>` #27593
  • Update the rids in the test projects #27033
    Area-Infrastructure
